name: Legor 9 - Best Free Puzzle & Brain Logic Game
name_original: Legor 9 - Best Free Puzzle & Brain Logic Game
description:
An award winning puzzle series Legor is back with new shapes to play with and 40 levels of increasing difficulty, is your logical thinking good enough to solve them all?

Legor 9 is the newest part of puzzle games Legor in which you must place all the Legor pieces into the board as fast as possible, your score depends on your speed! Go for highscores!

The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases!

How to play: Move the shapes with your finger, tap on them to rotate them and place all the Legor pieces into the empty slots! You must use all the shapes to progress to the next level!

Features:
* Great logical game for all ages
* 40 levels of increasing difficulty
* Check your brain skills
* Saved progress after each level
* Global leaderboards included - compare your score with other people all around the world
* 100% free full version + any In-App purchases

Have fun with with Legor 9 and if you like the game, please support it by leaving some comment and rating!

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:

Email: littlebigplay@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/littlebigplay
